text: Pen ñɨg wayn ak abe agak. Ñɨg wayn koŋɨm ak dɨl, chag meme wak mɨlep mɨgan ak ma sopal agak. Taynen? Sogɨl kɨmjen ñenɨgabal, ak tan aplanek, bɨŋ tɨmel yɨbɨl agɨl puglɨkɨl sogɨnɨgab agak. Sogek, chag meme wak ak tɨmel gɨnɨgab agak. Anɨb ak nɨŋɨd, ñɨg wayn koŋɨm ak dɨl, chag meme wak koŋɨm mɨgan ak nep sog lep agak.
